applet.name: InformationScreen
applet.title: Information Screen
applet.desc: Configurable screen saver that makes it possible to switch between different kind of information. Please note that you will also have to install the Information Screen plugin into your Squeezebox Server before this applet works
applet.changes: - Added support for non resized images (not used yet)
applet.creator: Erland Isaksson

applet.name: DaylightClock
applet.title: Daylight Clock
applet.desc: A screensaver for Squeezebox Controller/Touch/Radio devices that shows a clock with a daylight map of the earth in the background. It's possible to configure what kind of date/time information you like to show and you can select background among a number of different perspectives.
applet.changes: - Moved settings page under Settings/Screen/Screensavers - Updated so it doesn't refresh the image each time screen saver is activated
applet.creator: Erland Isaksson

applet.name: CustomClock
applet.title: Custom Clock
applet.desc: A screensaver for Squeezebox Controller/Touch/Radio devices that shows a clock. It is possible to select among a number of different styles and you can configure what kind of date/time information you like to show.
applet.changes: - Corrected bug in alarmtimetext, batteryicon, wirelessicon
applet.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: InformationScreen
plugin.title: Information Screen
plugin.desc: Configurable support plugin for Information Screen screen saver that makes it possible to switch between different kind of information. (Controller, Radio, Touch, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Corrected library template
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: AutoRepo
plugin.title: Auto Repositories
plugin.desc: Automatically makes all third party plugin repositories that are listed on the Logitech wiki site available through Extension Downloader. The plugin doesn't actually read the wiki page directly since that would open up a security hole, instead it reads the repositories from a list available on the erlandplugins Google Code project. New repostories added to the wiki page will be added after they have been checked so they provide serious plugins and not spam urls. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: TrackStat
plugin.title: TrackStat
plugin.desc: Store statistics such as rating, last played time and play counts so it survives a rescan and allows to to browse your library based on the statistic information. You can set the ratings via the Squeezebox player, CLI, Squeezebox Controller or web interface, ratings and statistic data can also be imported/exported from/to iTunes, Amarok and MusicIP Mixer. It also supports Dynamic Playlist plugin by adding dynamic playlists for all its statistics. Please note that TrackStat needs a bit more resources than small plugins and might also slow down startup of SqueezeCenter a bit, so you might get problems if you are running SqueezeCenter on slow hardware. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Added support for SqueezeCenter 7.4 - Corrected so internet meta data is shown correctly on Now Playing screen if one of the TRACKSTAT title formats is used - Added possibility to request parameters from top rated albums and most played album playlist templates for SQL Playlist - Added predefiend SQL Playlist playlists for playing top rated or most played albums in a genre, artist or year - Improved logic releated to finding moved tracks on multi disk albums when a TrackStat backup is restored
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: TrackStat
plugin.title: TrackStat
plugin.desc: Store statistics such as rating, last played time and play counts so it survives a rescan and allows to to browse your library based on the statistic information. You can set the ratings via the Squeezebox player, CLI, Squeezebox Controller or web interface, ratings and statistic data can also be imported/exported from/to iTunes, Amarok and MusicIP Mixer. It also supports Dynamic Playlist plugin by adding dynamic playlists for all its statistics. Please note that TrackStat needs a bit more resources than small plugins and might also slow down startup of SqueezeCenter a bit, so you might get problems if you are running SqueezeCenter on slow hardware. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Added context menu support in TrackStat menu - Corrected crash when two restore operations are performed immediately after each other - Added option to make it possible to deactivate the alternative path logic during restore and import
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: CustomBrowse
plugin.title: Custom Browse
plugin.desc: Makes it possible to customize the structure, contents and sorting of the browse menus on the Squeezebox. A new browse menu is configured as a xml file containing the structure and SQL-statements. Please note that Custom Browse needs a bit more resources than small plugins and might also slow down startup of SqueezeCenter a bit, so you might get problems if you are running SqueezeCenter on slow hardware. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Added support for filtering "Random Albums" menu by genre - Corrected so accelerated scrolling works in Tags menu on the Controller - Corrected so track details menu works on the Controller if latest SqueezeCenter 7.4 is used - Added support for showing duplicate text rows in album lists on the Controller (for example showing artists for an album) - Corrected so "Play all" items isn't repeated and doesn't overwrite real items in long lists on Controller - Added support for showing album arts in Tags menu - Corrected some small bugs
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: CustomBrowse
plugin.title: Custom Browse
plugin.desc: Makes it possible to customize the structure, contents and sorting of the browse menus on the Squeezebox. A new browse menu is configured as a xml file containing the structure and SQL-statements. Please note that Custom Browse needs a bit more resources than small plugins and might also slow down startup of SqueezeCenter a bit, so you might get problems if you are running SqueezeCenter on slow hardware. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Added support for Squeezeplay context menus from Custom Browse menus - Improved support for future iPeng versions through new type attribute - Changed so tracks are played in order in bitrates menu
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: CustomScan
plugin.title: Custom Scan
plugin.desc: Make it easier to develop modules that retreive additional information about artist, album, tracks from somehere. If used together with Custom Browse plugin, the included scanning modules for LastFM and custom tags makes it possible to browse music by LastFM tags or by a custom tag. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Added support for numeric sorted tags in Dynamic Tags menu - Added support for completely disable scanning modules to avoid refresh operation if only import/export modules are used - Added support for virtual tags using regular expressions in Custom Tag scanning module (Tag mapping parameter) - Added support for selecting to sort by number instead alphabetically in some custom tag menus - Added support for showing duplicate text lines in album lists on Controller (for examples showing the artist for an album), requires Custom Browse 2.8 or later. - Added support for showing album arts in Dyanmic Tags menu, requires Custom Browse 2.8 or later
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: CustomScan
plugin.title: Custom Scan
plugin.desc: Make it easier to develop modules that retreive additional information about artist, album, tracks from somehere. If used together with Custom Browse plugin, the included scanning modules for LastFM and custom tags makes it possible to browse music by LastFM tags or by a custom tag. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Corrected MP3 tag handling which was broken in 2.7.3
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: CustomSkip
plugin.title: Custom Skip
plugin.desc: Makes it possible to skip tracks automatically in dynamic playlists. Makes it possible to skip tracks with low ratings, zapped tracks, short tracks and much more. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Corrected so only local tracks can be skipped
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: DynamicPlayList
plugin.title: Dynamic Playlist
plugin.desc: Make it easy to create dynamic playlists for your own plugin. You simply need to implement two methods in your own plugin which returns the playlists and the next tracks. Currently at least supported by SQL Playlist plugin, TrackStat plugin, SugarCube plugin, iTunes Party Shuffle plugins and builtin support for saved static playlists. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Added support for SqueezeCenter 7.4 - Added support for custom tag based Dynamic Playlist mixers
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: DynamicPlayList
plugin.title: Dynamic Playlist
plugin.desc: Make it easy to create dynamic playlists for your own plugin. You simply need to implement two methods in your own plugin which returns the playlists and the next tracks. Currently at least supported by SQL Playlist plugin, TrackStat plugin, SugarCube plugin, iTunes Party Shuffle plugins and builtin support for saved static playlists. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Corrected so song mixers does not cause empty Song Info page
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: DatabaseQuery
plugin.title: Database Query
plugin.desc: Makes it possible to define and execute custom SQL statements towards SqueezeCenter database. The result can be displayed in the browser or exported as CSV or XML files. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Added support for SqueezeCenter 7.4 - Corrected some small bugs
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: DatabaseQuery
plugin.title: Database Query
plugin.desc: Makes it possible to define and execute custom SQL statements towards SqueezeCenter database. The result can be displayed in the browser or exported as CSV or XML files. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Added better error messages when failed to write file
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: MultiLibrary
plugin.title: Multi Library
plugin.desc: Makes it possible to divide your SqueezeCenter library into different sub libraries, requires Custom Browse plugin to be able to browse the sub libraries. Please note that Multi Library needs a bit more resources than small plugins and might also slow down startup of SqueezeCenter a bit, so you might get problems if you are running SqueezeCenter on slow hardware. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Added support for SqueezeCenter 7.4 - Corrected so internet meta data is shown correctly on Now Playing screen if MULTILIBRARIES title format is used - Corrected some small bugs
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: MultiLibrary
plugin.title: Multi Library
plugin.desc: Makes it possible to divide your SqueezeCenter library into different sub libraries, requires Custom Browse plugin to be able to browse the sub libraries. Please note that Multi Library needs a bit more resources than small plugins and might also slow down startup of SqueezeCenter a bit, so you might get problems if you are running SqueezeCenter on slow hardware. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Added minbitrate and maxbitrate to library definition - Added better error messages when failed to write file - Updated so url is used in playlist_track.track column
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: SQLPlayList
plugin.title: SQL Playlist
plugin.desc: Creates smart playlists based on SQL queries, its possible to create playlists similar to iTunes smart playlists if used together with ratings set with the TrackStat plugin. It requires Dynamic Playlist plugin. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Added support for SqueezeCenter 7.4 - Added support for requesting parameters from random albums playlist templates - Added predefined playlists for playing a random album in a genre, decade, artist, playlist or year - Corrected some small bugs
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: SQLPlayList
plugin.title: SQL Playlist
plugin.desc: Creates smart playlists based on SQL queries, its possible to create playlists similar to iTunes smart playlists if used together with ratings set with the TrackStat plugin. It requires Dynamic Playlist plugin. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Added better error messages when failed to write file - Adjusted to playlist_track.track containing an url instead of id - Corrected so it's possible to create a SQL playlist based on a playlist - Corrected random playlists so they work correctly with multiple players
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: TitleSwitcher
plugin.title: Title Switcher
plugin.desc: Makes it possible to get text information on the player screen that switches between different kind of information, for example showing artist 5 seconds and album name 5 seconds. The plugin requires that the Music Information Screen(MusicInfoSCR) plugin is installed. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, SoftSqueeze)
plugin.changes: - Corrected handling on SB1 devices with long texts
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: TrackStatPlaylist
plugin.title: TrackStat Playlist
plugin.desc: Makes it possible to export the TrackStat statistics such as ratings and played tracks to static playlists. This is useful when you like to manually update ratings in for example J River Media Center based on a playlist that contains all 4 rated tracks. Please note that this plugin requires you to install both TrackStat and Custom Scan plugin. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Added support for SqueezeCenter 7.4
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: TrackStatPlaylist
plugin.title: TrackStat Playlist
plugin.desc: Makes it possible to export the TrackStat statistics such as ratings and played tracks to static playlists. This is useful when you like to manually update ratings in for example J River Media Center based on a playlist that contains all 4 rated tracks. Please note that this plugin requires you to install both TrackStat and Custom Scan plugin. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Same version as 1.1pre1
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: PlaylistGenerator
plugin.title: Playlist Generator
plugin.desc: Makes it possible to generate static playlists based on information in SqueezeCenter database, such as ratings and played tracks. This is useful when you like to have a playlist as a .m3u file which you can export to other tools. This plugin works by itself but if you also install Custom Scan you will be able to re-generate all playlists automatically when you perform a rescan in SqueezeCenter. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Added support for SqueezeCenter 7.4
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: PlaylistGenerator
plugin.title: Playlist Generator
plugin.desc: Makes it possible to generate static playlists based on information in SqueezeCenter database, such as ratings and played tracks. This is useful when you like to have a playlist as a .m3u file which you can export to other tools. This plugin works by itself but if you also install Custom Scan you will be able to re-generate all playlists automatically when you perform a rescan in SqueezeCenter. (Boom, Transporter, Classic, Receiver, Controller, Radio, Touch, SoftSqueeze, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Added better error messages when failed to write file - Corrected so url is used in playlist_track.track column
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson

plugin.name: CustomClockHelper
plugin.title: Custom Clock Helper
plugin.desc: This is a helper plugin for the Custom Clock screen saver applet, it makes it possible to create your own clock styles and modify the existing styles (Controller, Radio, Touch, SqueezePlay)
plugin.changes: - Added title format support - Added support for rating icon
plugin.creator: Erland Isaksson
